trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event to customize the conversion of a cell value into a format suitable for display or to customize the appearance of a cell depending on its state or value.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件以自定义格式适用于显示的一个单元格值的转换，或自定义的具体取决于其状态或值的单元格的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>每次每个单元格绘制，因此，应避免耗时处理处理此事件时，事件时发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: This event also occurs when the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> is retrieved or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 也会发生此事件时该单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>检索或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is initialized with the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>与单元格的值初始化属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你提供从单元格的值的显示值的自定义转换，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>转换后的值，以确保新值所指定单元格的类型属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示没有进一步设置值的格式设置必要，请设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序完成后，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>是`null`或者不是正确的类型，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>格式都是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>属性返回的单元格样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，使用该单元格初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the display properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are used to render the cell.
trans-unit.target: 无论的值如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，返回的对象的显示属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性用于呈现该单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom formatting using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义格式设置使用的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件，请参阅[如何︰ 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义数据格式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免处理此事件时出现的性能损失，请通过事件处理程序，而不是直接访问该单元格的参数访问单元格。

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义格式化、 用户指定的值转换为实际的单元值，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The `desiredType` parameter represents the type that the `value` parameter should be converted to, and `desiredType` is assigned the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `desiredType`参数表示的类型，`value`应将参数转换为，和`desiredType`分配单元格的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a cell is formatting picture names as bitmaps, `value` is the <xref:System.String> that contains the picture name, and `desiredType` is a <xref:System.Type> representing the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果单元格是图片名称格式化为位图，`value`是<xref:System.String>包含图片名称和`desiredType`是<xref:System.Type>表示<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>类型。</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event handler does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property to a type that can be displayed by the cell, the cell contents will be formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件处理程序不会设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>为可由单元格，将使用格式化内容的单元格显示类型的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件的原因单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件的原因单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: The cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert `value` to.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的类型`value`到。

trans-unit.source: The style of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: 引起该事件的单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 -or- rowIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndex小于-1-或-rowIndex小于-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要格式化的单元格的样式。

trans-unit.source: Setting the properties of the object returned by the CellStyle property will change how the cell and its contents are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CellStyle 属性返回的对象的属性将更改单元格和其内容的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties, use this property to change the cell styles rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免性能损失，使用此属性更改单元格样式，而不是直接访问该单元格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: 单元格样式有关的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the display style of the cell being formatted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>表示正在格式化的单元格的显示样式。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是该单元格的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在格式化的单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: Use the ColumnIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: ColumnIndex 属性用于获取到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>属性的一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>索引

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 要设置格式而单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell value has been successfully formatted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已成功格式化单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: When handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, set the FormattingApplied property to `true` after setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property if no further value formatting is required.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件，将 FormattingApplied 属性设置为`true`后设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>如果没有更多值的格式是必需的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: If the FormattingApplied property value is `false` when the event handler exits, the formatting will be applied to the value as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 FormattingApplied 属性值是`false`当事件处理程序退出，格式设置将应用于值由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the formatting for the cell value has been handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已处理单元格的值的格式设置;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在格式化的单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: RowIndex 属性用于获取到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>属性的一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>索引

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 要设置格式而单元格的行索引。
